info.name: Candidate Database API Documentation
info.description: This is documentation for the current APIs developed for the candidate database

item.name: Candidates

query.description: Optional. If none provided, default value is 10.

request.description: Submits a get request to the database and retrieves candidates. Accepts a parameter for the number of records to be retrieved. If no number is specified, the default value will be set to 10.

response.name: Example request with a limit of 7

query.description: Optional. If none provided, default value is 10.

request.description:
Queries database for candidates that match the given query parameters. 

Requires at least one query parameter from the options below to be passed.

request.description: Given a candidate's database ID, updates candidate information in database with the information provided in request.

Adds a new candidate to the database, matching the fields that are provided in the request body. Requires fields for new candidate record to be sent in the request body in order to successfully create new candidate record.
Removes candidate record from database matching the candidate ID provided in the request.

item.description: This folder contains requests related to directly managing candidate records and information.

item.name: Locations

request.description:
Gets Cities that are represented by candidates in the database. 

Takes a name as an optional parameter, returning record of city with given name, or None if no such city exists.
Queries database and returns record of city matching provided city ID.
Queries the database and returns all cities that match the given country ID.
Queries database for existing country record that matches parameter(s) passed. At least one of the listed query parameters needs to be passed.

item.description: This folder contains requests that manage records of cities and countries that are represented by candidates in the database.

item.name: Functions

request.description: Queries database for function that matches field(s) provided in query parameters. At least one query parameter needs to be provided.
Queries database and returns functions from database. Takes a limit query parameter. If no limit is provided, it's default value is set to 10.
Adds function passed as parameter to database, returning the record of the function in the database as a response.

item.description: This folder contains requests related to directly managing records and information regarding the functions (skills) being represented in the database.

item.name: Industries

request.description: Queries database and returns industries from database. Takes a limit query parameter. If no limit is provided, it's default value is set to 10.
Queries database for function that matches field(s) provided in query parameters. At least one query parameter needs to be provided.
Adds industry passed as parameter to database, returning the record of the industry in the database as a response.

item.description: This folder contains requests related to directly managing records and information regarding the industries being represented in the database.

item.name: Employers

request.description: Submits a request to the database to retrieve employers. Takes a parameter called limit that specifies the number of records to be retrieved. If no limit is specified, the default value is set to 10.

response.name: Example Request

request.description: Queries database for employers that match the fields provided in the request. At least one field needs to be provided to search the database.
Given an employer's database ID, updates employer information in database with the information provided in request. Requires fields to be updated to be passed in request body.

Adds a new employer to the database, matching the fields that are provided in the request body. Requires fields for new employer record to be sent in the request body in order to successfully create new employer record.

item.description: This folder contains requests related to directly managing records and information regarding the employers being represented in the database.
